name: Reform (ciderwrath)
description:
This is our Ludum Dare 35 Entry. The theme is Shapeshifting, so we made a puzzle-platformer about a character who transforms through the guidance of another. The game is fully playable and we hope people enjoy what we have finished so far.

Team consists of ciderWrath and EvanEGibbs.

@ciderWrath

@EvanEGibbs

Music by F0R3ST12

http://f0r3st12.newgrounds.com/audio/
